channel.title: indexd-server on Monaparty Portal | Crypto asset platform based on Counterparty, Monacoin
channel.description: Recent content in indexd-server on Monaparty Portal | Crypto asset platform based on Counterparty, Monacoin

item.title: indexd-server is updated to 0.0.2
item.description: Monaparty version of indexd-server was updated to 0.0.2. This includes an usability bug fix. https://github.com/monaparty/indexd-server/pull/2 This was applied both of the develop branch and the master branch. For wallet users There is no need to action. Please wait until servers are updated. For node maintainers Please upgrade your indexd-servers like this. fednode rebuild indexd fednode rebuild indexd-testnet In this time, you don’t need to run fednode update. There is no reparse job running.
